title: Semiconductor ETFs Strengthen Ahead of an Optimistic Nvidia Earnings Report
text: Nvidia (NasdaqGS: NVDA) surged on Tuesday, lifting semiconductor sector-related exchange traded funds, as traders took an optimistic bet on the chipmaker ahead of its earnings release. On Tuesday, the iShares PHLX Semiconductor ETF (NasdaqGS: SOXX) gained 4.8% and the VanEck Vectors Semiconductor ETF (SMH) rose 4.6%.

title: Why AMD, Nvidia And Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Shares Are Rising
text: Shares of several companies in the broader tech and semiconductor sectors, including Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD), NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) and Taiwan Semiconductor Mfg. Co. Ltd. (NYSE:TSM), are all trading higher amid overall market strength after Russia announced it would pull back some troops positioned on the Ukrainian border.

title: Nvidia Leads the Nasdaq Higher, But This Winner's More of a Surprise
text: Find out what's helping the stock market on Tuesday.

title: The Arm Deal Didn't Happen, But Don't Sweat the Impact on Nvidia Stock
text: With NVDA stock down before its earnings this week, should you be worried that the Arm deal cancellation means the 2022 slump will continue? The post The Arm Deal Didn't Happen, But Don't Sweat the Impact on Nvidia Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: How to Trade Nvidia Stock Ahead of Earnings
text: Nvidia reports earnings tonight. Here's what you need to know and how to profit from a bullish outcome using NVDA stock options.

title: Nvidia ETFs in Focus Ahead of Q4 Earnings
text: Caught in the tech sector selling spree, triggered by rate hike concerns, NVIDIA has plunged 19.2% over the past three months. This trend might reverse if the chipmaker comes up with an earnings beat in its Q4 report.

title: Why Nvidia Stock Popped Ahead of Earnings
text: Piper Sandler starts the cheering early.

title: Tuesday Morning's 15 Tech Stock Movers Include Intel, Nvidia and Tower Semiconductor
text: Tech stocks got off to a slightly upbeat start Tuesday morning, fueled by Intel's $5.4 billion proposed acquisition of Tower Semiconductor.

title: Buy Nvidia Stock: It's America's 7th-Largest Company
text: Despite its $40 billion acquisition falling through, Nvidia is now the seventh-largest U.S. company. Why are investors so down on NVDA stock?
